name: Treens: Pixel Warriors
description:
Okay, let's get it out of the way: The browser version sucks!!! It's slow, and due to technical limitations it can't access your clipboard to paste in the level editor. If you are on a Windows device, you'd be much better off downloading the executable version.

Developed by me and @boople__snoot for XanderJam #2. Maybe if I hadn't started 5 days late, I would have finished online multiplayer in time.

Features include:

  • 2-4 Player Multiplayer
  • Fully destructible terrain
  • Pretty fun 'level editor'
  • Local, but not online, multiplayer
  • Some bombs. some treens.

Don't ask how it fits the theme, the characters are 7 pixels each. If that's not 'less is more' I don't know what is
